inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getCluster.

tags.description: Map of tags assigned to the cluster.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getCluster.

aclName.description: Name of the Access Control List associated with the cluster.

autoMinorVersionUpgrade.description: True when the cluster allows automatic minor version upgrades.

dataTiering.description: True when data tiering is enabled.

enginePatchVersion.description: Patch version number of the Redis engine used by the cluster.

engineVersion.description: Version number of the Redis engine used by the cluster.

finalSnapshotName.description: Name of the final cluster snapshot to be created when this resource is deleted. If omitted, no final snapshot will be made.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

kmsKeyArn.description: ARN of the KMS key used to encrypt the cluster at rest.

maintenanceWindow.description: Weekly time range during which maintenance on the cluster is performed. Specify as a range in the format `ddd:hh24:mi-ddd:hh24:mi` (24H Clock UTC). Example: `sun:23:00-mon:01:30`.

nodeType.description: Compute and memory capacity of the nodes in the cluster.

numReplicasPerShard.description: The number of replicas to apply to each shard.

numShards.description: Number of shards in the cluster.

parameterGroupName.description: The name of the parameter group associated with the cluster.

port.description: Port number that this node is listening on.

securityGroupIds.description: Set of VPC Security Group ID-s associated with this cluster.

shards.description: Set of shards in this cluster.

snapshotRetentionLimit.description: The number of days for which MemoryDB retains automatic snapshots before deleting them. When set to `0`, automatic backups are disabled.

snapshotWindow.description: Daily time range (in UTC) during which MemoryDB begins taking a daily snapshot of your shard. Example: `05:00-09:00`.

snsTopicArn.description: ARN of the SNS topic to which cluster notifications are sent.

subnetGroupName.description: The name of the subnet group used for the cluster.

tags.description: Map of tags assigned to the cluster.

tlsEnabled.description: When true, in-transit encryption is enabled for the cluster.
